metadata.title: CVE-2020-12352 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Improper access control in BlueZ may allow an unauthenticated user topotentially enable information disclosure via adjacent access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
